## PaneClassDefinition.component property

A react component that renders the content of the pane. It is given a single prop, `paneId`<!-- -->, which is a unique identifier for the pane.

If you wish to store and persist the state of the pane, simply use a sheet and an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
component: React.ComponentType<{
        paneId: string;
    }>;
```
